Text: Good GOD!! This is WONDERFUL! I've been looking for some real Irish textbooks and language learning material for AGES, and now I've found everything at once, plus Scottish Gaelic, Welsh and Breton! I just can't believe it! Thank you, GalitShpichter!
Tapadh leat! once I download, I will try and seed for as long as possible, because this looks to me so far like its the perfect collection :D

Thanks man, It's really nice of you keep seeding this thing. I'm very excited about this material so now I'm about to print some of these books to learn those Irish and Breton!!!! By the way, the most beautiful thing about this collection is that it has AUDIO!!!! So I can perfect my pronounciation. Great job. I'm seeding...)
Man, I'm so happy so I'm making another comment! THANK YOU!!!!!

By the way, I found Colloquial Hebrew. It took me a month of downlading because there was only 1 seeder and he was bitchy like I don't know who... So, contact me, if you need that stuff. mcstann@mail.ru
